mapper.update: UPDATE MAINTENANCE_RECORD SET maintenance_date = #{maintenanceDate}, odometer = #{odometer}, item = #{item}, total_cost = #{totalCost}, memo = #{memo}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.select: SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date, odometer, item, total_cost, memo, created_at, updated_at FROM MAINTENANCE_RECORD WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date, odometer, item, total_cost, memo, created_at, updated_at FROM MAINTENANCE_RECORD WHERE vehicle_id = #{vehicleId} ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC

SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date, odometer, item, total_cost, memo, created_at, updated_at FROM MAINTENANCE_RECORD WHERE vehicle_id = #{vehicleId} AND item = #{itemName} ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 1
